alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; Lawrence (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Independence, northeastern Jackson and southwestern Lawrence Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Strawberry, or 12 miles southwest of Lake Charles State Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Swifton... Portia... Strawberry... Lynn... Alicia... Minturn... Smithville... Powhatan... Strangers Home... Eaton... Lauratown... Clover Bend... Calvin... Dicus... Dowdy... Coffman... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
